Williams, Neil Presentation describing the implementation of a Research management system at the University of Glamorgan. </summary> <dc:date>2010-06-14T13:52:45Z</dc:date> </entry> <entry> <title>Advocacy: the theory</title> <link href="http://hdl.handle.net/2160/4663" rel="alternate"/> <author> <name>Knowles, Jackie</name> </author> <id>http://hdl.handle.net/2160/4663</id> <updated>2014-10-22T11:42:07Z</updated> <published>2010-06-09T00:00:00Z</published> <summary type="text">Advocacy: the theory Knowles, Jackie Presentation introducing the importance of advocacy in encouraging stakeholders to interact with institutional repositories, along with suggested methods of how to do this. </summary> <dc:date>2010-06-09T00:00:00Z</dc:date> </entry> <entry> <title>Using statistics as an advocacy tool</title> <link href="http://hdl.handle.net/2160/4662" rel="alternate"/> <author> <name>Cashman, Nicky</name> </author> <id>http://hdl.handle.net/2160/4662</id> <updated>2014-10-22T11:42:07Z</updated> <published>2010-06-09T00:00:00Z</published> <summary type="text">Using statistics as an advocacy tool Cashman, Nicky Presentation describing how to carry out statistical reserach and how findings can be used to inform reports and papers for senior management staff. </summary> <dc:date>2010-06-09T00:00:00Z</dc:date> </entry> <entry> <title>Encouraging author self- deposit at Cardiff University</title> <link href="http://hdl.handle.net/2160/4661" rel="alternate"/> <author> <name>Andrews, Tracey</name> </author> <author> <name>Hill, Scott</name> </author> <id>http://hdl.handle.net/2160/4661</id> <updated>2014-10-22T11:41:39Z</updated> <published>2010-06-09T00:00:00Z</published> <summary type="text">Encouraging author self- deposit at Cardiff University Andrews, Tracey; Hill, Scott Presentation describing the work at Cardiff University on the I-WIRE Project and how the newly designed interface within Cardiff University's Modern Working Environment (MWE) aims to encourage deposit by authors into ORCA, Cardiff Universty's institutional repository. </summary> <dc:date>2010-06-09T00:00:00Z</dc:date> </entry> </feed>
